about_the_game:
WARNING: This DLC is intended only for adults 18 years of age or older and contains content which some players might find offensive.
This DLC adds the Uncensored Mode to the Game.

Looking for a more naughty experience? This DLC allows you to play an uncensored version of One Eleven, featuring bonus and alternate scenes with beautiful high-resolution illustrations. These scenes include FULL NUDITY, NSFW dialogue and voice performances in a sex scenes. You can toggle this content on or off in a game "settings" menu, allowing you to experience the game however you like, whenever you like!

Contents:
  • Alternate scenes that contain full nudity, sexual imagery and sounds
  • Bonus dialogue and alternate dialogues
  • Bonus CGs and alternate CGs
  • Bonus in-game achievements

content_descriptors.notes:
Contains alternate scenes with full nudity/sex imagery and sounds.
-Sexually suggestive outfits are added to this version, including revealing cleavage and underwear.
-Alternate text/dialogue in some cases that has more sexually explicit and mature wording and audio.
-Several of the images/artwork is changed to be 18+

name: One Eleven - 18+ Uncensored DLC
short_description: Erotic thriller detective. The main character attends a date where a murder occurs. Now we need to investigate this brutal crime. During which we begin a relationship with the suspects.
